snippet.title: SPIRIT RIDING FREE | Ride Along Adventure Trailer | Netflix
snippet.description:
★ WATCH MORE ★  https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUz9dUBXQpkRw1ncT5bTXIRA
★ SUBSCRIBE ★  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCz9dUBXQpkRw1ncT5bTXIRA?sub_confirmation=1

When Maricela’s horse is stolen by a group of bandits, the PALs embark on a daring adventure to rescue her back! Take control of the PALs latest adventure in the Spirit Riding Free: Ride Along Adventure Interactive Special!

Lucky, a gutsy 12-year-old girl, befriends a wild mustang she names Spirit. With her two best friends Abigail and Pru and their horses by her side, they explore a world filled with endless adventure, magnificent horses and never ending fun!

#DreamWorksSpirit #DreamWorks #SpiritRidingFree
